revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: Letters of the Right Honourable Lady M---y W---y M----e : written, during her travels in Europe, Asia and Africa, to persons of distinction, men of letters, &c. in d..."
revision.text: Possibly: Letters of the Right Honourable Lady M---y W---y M----e : written, during her travels in Europe, Asia and Africa, to persons of distinction, men of letters, &c. in different parts of Europe. Which contain, among other curious relations, accounts of the policy and manners of the Turks; drawn from sources that have previously been inaccessible to other travellers ..., by Lady Mary Wortley Montagu. (London : printed for S. Payne, A Cook, and H. Hill, 1767). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1425118~S1
